thread.title: Joey Barton slams N'Golo Kante: Chelsea star is overrated - this is why
thread.title_full: Joey Barton slams N'Golo Kante: Chelsea star is overrated - this is why

title: Joey Barton slams N'Golo Kante: Chelsea star is overrated - this is why
text:
Joey Barton slams N'Golo Kante: Chelsea star is overrated - this is why CHELSEA star N'Golo Kante is not worth the hype, according to Burnley midfielder Joey Barton. PUBLISHED: 18:07, Mon, Mar 20, 2017 | UPDATED: 18:18, Mon, Mar 20, 2017 GETTY Joey Barton thinks N'Golo Kante is overhyped 
N'Golo Kante looks set to win back-to-back Premier League titles with different clubs. 
The Frenchman was a star of Leicester's title-winning side last term and he has been equally impressive in this campaign with Chelsea. 
However, Burnley midfielder Joey Barton thinks he is overrated and believes it has simply become fashionable for pundits to praise the 25-year-old. GETTY Joey Barton thinks it's become popular to rave about N'Golo Kante 
"In England, there are boxes and it is impossible to get out of them," Barton told French newspaper Le Journal du Dimanche . 
"At the moment, for example, everyone swears by N'Golo Kante. It's fashionable. 
"For pundits, he's the best midfielder in the world but that's not the case â€“ he's very good, but I played against him three weeks ago. Antonio Conte's crazy celebration after Gary Cahill's winner against Stoke Sat, March 18, 2017 Antonio Conte went a little bit mad after Gary Cahill's winner against Stoke City at the bet365 Stadium, and the home side won't be too pleased with the Chelsea manager
